properties.areaDesc: Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire; Southern Washington; Northern Washington; Eastern Windham
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:29AM EST until January 26 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet
accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around
one tenth of an inch, except up to one quarter of an inch across
higher elevations of the Berkshires. Winds gusting as high as
35 mph across higher elevations of the Berkshires.

* WHERE...In Vermont, Eastern Windham County. In New York,
Washington County. In Massachusetts, Berkshire County.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Saturday to 4 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Untreated ground surfaces will become slippery. Plan
on slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges. Slippery travel
conditions expected. Isolated power outages are possible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy ground conditions could linger a few
hours after temperatures rise above the freezing mark.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
